problem_text_cn: 某地区准备修建一座高AB=6m的过街天桥,已知天桥的坡面AC与地面BC的夹角∠ACB的余弦值为\frac{4}{5},则坡面AC的长度为()
problem_text_en: A certain area is going to build an overpass with height AB = N_0. It is known that the the cosine of angle between the slope AC of the overpass and the ground BC ∠ACB is \frac{N_1}{N_2}, so the length of the slope AC is ()
raw_comment: 此题考查的是解直角三角形的应用,熟练掌握直角三角形中边角之间的关系是解答此类题目的关键．
